elements.label: Workspace
elements.helpText:
The selected folder is used as the workspace where all intermediate and output files will be written.

If the selected folder does not exist, it will be created.

If datasets already exist in the selected folder, they will be overwritten.

elements.label: Results Suffix (Optional)
elements.helpText: This text will be appended to the end of the output files to help separate multiple runs.

elements.label: Area of interest (Vector) (optional)
elements.helpText: This is a set of polygons that will be used to aggregate carbon values at the end of the run if provided.

elements.label: Farthest from edge
elements.helpText: This scenario converts the convertible landcover codes starting at the furthest pixel from the closest base landcover codes and moves inward.

elements.label: Nearest to edge
elements.helpText: This scenario converts the convertible landcover codes starting at the closest pixel in the base landcover codes and moves outward.

elements.label: Number of Steps in Conversion
elements.helpText: This parameter is used to divide the conversion simulation into equal subareas of the requested max area. During each sub-step the distance transform is recalculated from the base landcover codes.  This can affect the final result if the base types are also convertible types.
